Global Space and Technology Convention & Exhibition (GSTCE) 2026

13 May 2026 – 14 May 2026

Singapore Space and Technology Limited Singapore, Singapore

The Global Space and Technology Convention & Exhibition (GSTCE) 2026 will be held on May 13–14, 2026, at the prestigious Sands Expo and Convention Centre, Marina Bay Sands, Singapore. Organized by Singapore Space and Technology Limited, GSTCE stands as Asia’s leading marketplace, where global visionaries converge to drive innovation, forge commercial partnerships, and unlock the vast potential of the space economy. Therefore, this event becomes an essential platform for professionals seeking to shape the future of space technology and its cross-sector applications.

Embracing the Theme: Commercializing Space for Economic Growth

The chosen theme for GSTCE 2026, “Commercializing Space: Driving Economic Value Across Industries,” reflects the rapidly evolving role of space technologies across multiple economic sectors. Attendees will explore how collaboration between aerospace, telecommunications, artificial intelligence, health, finance, and smart city industries propels commercial viability. Moreover, the convention focuses on bold innovation, turning visionary ideas into practical solutions that benefit society at large while creating new business opportunities. This active approach underscores GSTCE’s role in fostering sustainable economic growth through space.

Extensive Participation Highlighting Innovation and Diversity

Building on the successes of previous editions, GSTCE 2026 is expected to host over 600 organizations and 1,500 delegates from around the world. The programme features more than 60 workshops and panel sessions covering critical topics such as satellite communications, space applications in climate monitoring, regulatory challenges, and investment trends. Furthermore, the event showcases five country pavilions, allowing international space communities to present emerging technologies and collaborative ventures. Consequently, this comprehensive format delivers broad insights and valuable business connections in one venue.

Networking and Investment Opportunities That Drive Progress

GSTCE 2026 provides dynamic networking settings and investor pitching sessions designed to cultivate partnerships, funding prospects, and technology commercialization. The refreshed Singapore Pavilion, sponsored by leading innovators like TransFingo, highlights local startups and established enterprises advancing Asia’s space capabilities. Additionally, representatives from government agencies and policy makers actively engage with participants to discuss regulatory frameworks and future initiatives. Collectively, these elements create an ecosystem that nurtures innovation, accelerates commercialization, and ensures alignment with public policies.

A Must-Attend Event for Industry Professionals

Space engineers, business strategists, investors, and government officials benefit immensely from GSTCE’s market intelligence, technological demonstrations, and strategic dialogues. The event’s location in Singapore enhances accessibility to Asia-Pacific’s fast-growing space market, while reinforcing Singapore’s status as a global space and technology hub. Moreover, the timing perfectly coincides with increasing space commercialization and international investments, making GSTCE a crucial venue to stay ahead in the competitive landscape. Participating enables professionals to forge partnerships critical for long-term success.

Empowering Asia’s Space Economy at GSTCE 2026

In conclusion, the Global Space and Technology Convention & Exhibition 2026 represents a transformative milestone in fostering innovation and collaboration across the global space sector. By combining expert insights, exhibitions, and deal-making opportunities under one roof, GSTCE empowers stakeholders to unlock the full commercial and societal potential of space technologies. Professionals eager to shape the future of the space economy must prioritize attendance at this landmark event.

Impact Orbit Creative Group

Impact Orbit Creative Group is a multi-disciplinary consultancy and innovation hub focused on driving sustainable growth, digital transformation, and impact-led strategies in the space and technology sectors. We partner with organisations and startups worldwide to deliver strategic guidance, communications expertise, and frameworks for responsible innovation.
